5365.verse: وَلَا|And not|72|80|25$بِقَوْلِ|(it is the) word|120|136|17287$كَاهِنٍ‌ۚ|(of) a soothsayer;|142|158|17289$قَلِيلاً|little|63|79|433$مَّا|(is) what|80|96|262$تَذَكَّرُونَ|you remember.|118|126|6186$

5358.verse: So there is not for him here this Day any devoted friend

5359.verse: Nor any food except from the discharge of wounds;

5360.verse: None will eat it except the sinners.

5361.verse: So I swear by what you see

5362.verse: And what you do not see

5363.verse: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is the word of a noble Messenger.

5364.verse: And it is not the word of a poet; little do you believe.

5365.verse: Nor the word of a soothsayer; little do you remember.

5366.verse: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.

5367.verse: And if Muhammad had made up about Us some [false] sayings,

5368.verse: We would have seized him by the right hand;

5369.verse: Then We would have cut from him the aorta.

5370.verse: And there is no one of you who could prevent [Us] from him.

5371.verse: And indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder for the righteous.

5372.verse: And indeed, We know that among you are deniers.

5373.verse: And indeed, it will be [a cause of] regret upon the disbelievers.

5374.verse: And indeed, it is the truth of certainty.

5375.verse: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

5376.verse: A supplicant asked for a punishment bound to happen

5377.verse: To the disbelievers; of it there is no preventer.

5378.verse: [It is] from Allah, owner of the ways of ascent.

5379.verse: The angels and the Spirit will ascend to Him during a Day the extent of which is fifty thousand years.

5380.verse: So be patient with gracious patience.

5383.verse: On the Day the sky will be like murky oil,

5384.verse: And the mountains will be like wool,

5385.verse: And no friend will ask [anything of] a friend,
